## Participant.champion property

The stats of the champion being played by this participant.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly champion: {
        key: number;
        id: string;
        champ: Champion;
        level: number;
        xp: number;
        abilitiesCasted: Collection<'Q' | 'W' | 'E' | 'R', number>;
        form?: number;
    };
```
